reviewText: For the time period it was filmed... good movie. Very telling of the Hollywood mayhem.

This dvd is absolutely the worst 3.00 I have spent at amazon.
All it consists of is three people talking about how his connections allow him to find out info and get "the shot"
Nothing here is at all interesting.
If you wanted to see the life of paparazzi, BBCA had a show by the same name that featured Big Pictures and how they got the shots, etc.
